mapper.select: select tbl_Contents.Contents_ID contentsID ,tbl_Contents.Category_ID categoryID ,tbl_Contents.Contents_Title title ,tbl_Contents.Contents_Keyword keyword ,tbl_Contents.Contents_Location location ,tbl_Contents.Contents_Country country ,tbl_Contents.Contents_City city ,tbl_Contents.Contents_Rating rating ,tbl_Contents.Contents_View_Cnt contentsViewCnt ,tbl_Contents.Contents_Review_Cnt contentsReviewCnt ,tbl_Contents.Contents_Scrap_Cnt contentsScrapCnt ,tbl_Contents.Contents_Thumbnail contentsThumbnail ,tbl_Contents_Detail.Contents_Contents contents ,tbl_Contents_Detail.Contents_Time time ,tbl_Contents_Detail.Contents_Tel tel ,tbl_Contents_Detail.Contents_Lat lat ,tbl_Contents_Detail.Contents_Long lng ,tbl_Contents_Detail.Contents_Contents contents from tbl_Contents LEFT JOIN tbl_Contents_Detail on tbl_Contents.Contents_ID = tbl_Contents_Detail.Contents_ID where tbl_Contents.Contents_ID = #{contentsID}

select count(Contents_ID) from tbl_Contents where Category_ID = 2
